title: Episode 66 - Episodes 186-189 Rewatch: The Tragic Tale of Noland and Calgara
creator: Sunny Go One Piece Podcast
description: In-depth podcast coverage of episodes 186-189, examining the entirety of the history of Jaya, Shandians and Skypiea, including the flashback of Montblanc Noland and the Great Warrior Calgara and their incredible friendship.

title: One Piece, 187-189
creator: Unknown
description: Podcast episode covering One Piece episodes 187-189, focusing on the Noland and Kalgara flashback arc.

title: 187: Lead by a Bell's Sound! Tale of the Great Warrior and the Explorer!
creator: Never Watched One Piece
description: Blog review of Episode 187 praising the episode and noting that Montblanc Noland was 'a hero of his country, an accomplished explorer, sailor and botanist' rather than the foolish character portrayed in legend.

title: One Piece: Noland and Kalgara's beautiful story
creator: Sportskeeda
description: Article analyzing the friendship between Noland and Kalgara, describing it as one of the most touching stories in One Piece and explaining how their bond survived through their descendants.

title: Revisiting Skypiea: Essential Episodes and Underrated Gems in One Piece's Sky Island Arc
creator: ChibiBytes
description: Blog post highlighting essential episodes in the Skypiea arc, including the Noland and Kalgara flashback episodes which are considered underrated gems.

title: Sam's Piece: Skypiea Is the Best 'One Piece' Arc and There's Nothing You Can Do About It
creator: The One Piece Podcast
description: Editorial defending the Skypiea arc as the best One Piece arc, with particular emphasis on the emotional impact of the Noland and Kalgara flashback.

title: The Everlasting One Piece Readalong: Vols. 31-33
creator: Barnes & Noble
description: Manga readalong covering volumes 31-33, which include the Noland and Kalgara flashback chapters (chapters 286-291) that Episode 187 adapts.

title: One Piece: The Tragic History of Skypiea
creator: Game Rant
description: Article exploring the tragic history of Skypiea, with focus on the Noland and Kalgara story and how their friendship was tragically cut short by misunderstanding and death.

title: Episode 187 - One Piece Wiki
creator: One Piece Wiki
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 187 with episode details, plot summary, character debuts, and trivia.

title: Mont Blanc Noland - One Piece Wiki
creator: One Piece Wiki
description: Character wiki page for Mont Blanc Noland with comprehensive information about his history, abilities, and significance to the story.

title: Kalgara - One Piece Wiki
creator: One Piece Wiki
description: Character wiki page for Kalgara with detailed information about his life, friendship with Noland, and legacy.

title: Tree Fever - One Piece Wiki
creator: One Piece Wiki
description: Wiki page explaining Tree Fever disease, its symptoms, cure, and role in the Noland and Kalgara flashback.

title: Kashigami - One Piece Wiki
creator: One Piece Wiki
description: Wiki page about Kashigami, the giant snake worshipped as a god by the Shandia and killed by Noland.
